p: Abiotic stress, such as salt, mannitol, water, and heat, can significantly impact the production of the potato crop. Salinity affects plant development and growth through interference with the plantâ€™s physiological system. The FPKM expression values were used to calculate the fold change (FC) and log 2 FC by comparing controls with respective treated samples ( Fig 4, S3 Table). The comparative analysis showed fifty-five StbZIPs in leaf tissues after treatment with 150 mM NaCl. Out of these, thirteen had an expression of > 2 FC, and thirty-one of < 2 FC. However, differential log 2 FC expression analysis showed that only StbZIP 62 and 66 showed positive differential log 2 FC in salt stress condition. StbZIPs that showed negatively differential log 2 FC expression during this salt stress were StbZIP 7, 2, 4, 6, 23, 32, 38, 48, 49, 75, and 71. These bZIPs could serve as negative regulators during salt stress.
